All Classes

  • All Classes Interface Summary Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Account
    The account activity allows a player to chang contact information associated with their player profile, such as email and phone number
    CameraActivity
    Activity that calls the camera in order to scan a QR Code Allows a player to scan QR codes and also capture images of said QR codes.
    Comment
    Models a single comment on a saved QR Code.
    CommentList
    A container for displaying each comment attached to a given QR code.
    CommentsPage
    Class to model a Comments Page Activity.
    GameQRCode
    This class represents the Game QR Codes that players can scan to get points
    GameQRCodeAdapter
    An array adapter which is used to display a list of QR codes within the PlayerCollectionActivity.
    MainActivity
    The MainActivity is the landing page for a user when they launch the app.
    MapsActivity
    Retrieves player location and shows Qr Codes within a certain range Code for accessing location, asking for permissions, and onLocationChange listener have been used from - From: Github URL: https://github.com/mohsinulkabir14/An-Android-Application-to-Show-Your-Position-On-The-Map-Using-Google-Maps-API/blob/master/app/src/main/java/com/example/maplocation/MapsActivity.java Author:Mohsinul Kabir
    NearByCodesAdapter
    The nearby codes adabter allows NearbyQR Codes to be added to an array adapter for display in a listview element within the maps activity.
    NearbyQRCode
    The nearby QR code represents a QR code on the map which can be seen within the user's searchable radius.
    OwnerAllPlayers
    Responsible for displaying and active management of players and QR codes The owner can view and click delete on players and QR Codes here
    OwnerLogin
    The page where the owner logs in The owner's login information is authenticated via firebase The owner can either login or reset their password via email
    OwnerQRRecyclerviewAdapter
    Responsible for listing all QR codes of the app, and enabling deletion of these QR codes
    OwnerRecyclerviewAdapter
    Responsible for listing all players of the app, and enabling deletion of these players
    Player
    Represents an application user.
    PlayerCollectionActivity
    The player collection activity display's a players statistics and any QR codes which have been added to their code.
    PlayerListAdapter
    An array adapter which is used to display a list of Player profiles within the MainActivity.
    QRCodeFoundListener
    Listener for functions when QR Code is found/not found
    QRCodeImageAnalyzer
    Analyzes the image of the QR and extracts the data from it This entire class was implemented using - From: Learn To Android URL:https://learntodroid.com/how-to-create-a-qr-code-scanner-app-in-android/ Author:Jarrod Lilkendey
    SaveImageActivity
    The SaveImageActivity allows a user to attach an image, using the default built in camera, to some QR code that has just been scanned.
    SaveQRActivity
    The save QR activity allows a user to save a QR code to their player profile, and also gives the user two additional options: 1.
    SearchPlayer
    The SearchPlayer activity displays information for a player that has just been searched by the user on the homepage.
    ShareableQrActivity
    The shareable QR Activity generates and displays a QR code which encodes a special string, meant to communicate with other users either one's game status, or one's player profile.
